keyMappings:
# chrome supports: ctrl+r for refresh
# ctrl+shift+r for hard refresh (ignore caches)

##### Current tab history & tab url
map a goBack
map s goForward
map h goBack
map l goForward
#map gt goUp
#map gT goToRoot

##### Tab navigation & move tab
map A previousTab
map S nextTab
map <c-j> previousTab
map <c-k> nextTab
map ; visitPreviousTab
map w visitPreviousTab
map gw lastTab
map g; lastTab
map <a-j> moveTabLeft
map <a-k> moveTabRight
map <a-[> moveTabLeft count=99
map <a-]> moveTabRight count=99
# swap: lower case for global mark, upper case for local mark
map m Marks.activateCreateMode swap
map ` Marks.activateGotoMode swap
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode swap

##### Page scroll
map e scrollPageUp
map H scrollLeft
map L scrollRight

##### Vomnibars
map o Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map O Vomnibar.activate
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
# W reserved for open current tab in a new window
# map W Vomnibar.activateTabSelection

##### Follow links
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map <a-F> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map <a-h> LinkHints.activateMode action=focus
map <a-H> LinkHints.activateMode action=hover
map <a-c> LinkHints.activateMode action=copy-text
map I LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
map ga goPrevious
map gs goNext
map gh goPrevious
map gl goNext

##### Misc
map R reload hard
map q passNextKey

##### Custom search engines
map gy Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=y
map gt Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=t

##### Disables
# unmap [[
# unmap ]]
unmap <<
unmap >>
unmap <c-e>
unmap <c-y>
unmap ^
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
t: https://translate.google.com/?sl=en&tl=zh-CN&text=%s Google Translate

# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
